name: Reflector (ijskar)
description:
My 2018 GMTK Jam entry. The theme was GENRE, but you can't MECHANIC. Information on this game jam can be found on this page.

For this jam I made a top-down shooter, named Reflector. Enemies come from all sides, but you can only shoot in four directions and can't move. A mouse-controlled mirror must be used to reach enemies and score points. But be careful: running out of ammunition = game over! Hit ammo packs to stay in the game. How many points can you score in a minute?

Instructions:

  • Hit the white side of the mirror to reflect bullets.
  • The blue circle around the player indicates remaining ammo.
  • No ammo = game over
  • Walls appear which 

Controls:

  • Use WASD to change the player's direction.
  • Use mouse to move mirror
  • Use Q and E to rotate the mirror.
